description: This file implements the basic container functions for the Slap Bmc2 Command Object in a service logic aggregation system. It includes functions for creating, removing, enrolling objects, and initializing the object, with references to related global and collection management functions. The code primarily defines object lifecycle management for the command object within the SLAP framework.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapBmc2ComoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a Slap Bmc2 Command Object, setting up function pointers and object context.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapBmc2ComoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the command object, removing its associated resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapBmc2ComoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls necessary subordinate objects into the command object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapBmc2ComoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the command object, setting its parameters and function pointers to default or initial values.
